data.name: ApplicationDescription
data.value:
Convert your online Google/outlook calendar data to readable format
Formats supported : CSV

data.name: Publish_ReleaseNotes
data.value:
5.2.0.0 (12-Jul-2024) Not just .csv, Now you can export your data to .json, .xml and .ics format too. Bug fixes.
5.1.19.1 (05-Apr-2024) Accellerate downloads with threading, Bug fixes, Improved translations.
5.0.15.0 (19-Dec-2023) Adding support for Microsoft/Outlook Calendar, Bug Fixes, Improved User Experience
5.0.10.0 (26-Sep-2023) Bug Fixes, Improved User Experience, define you own date format(Custom)
4.0.0.0 (6-Jan-2023) Bug Fixes, Improved User Experience.
3.0.17.0 (14-Sep-2022) New Columns Duration, TotalHours, TotalMinutes for any further calculation after export. Bug Fixes
3.0.11.0 (9-Mar-2022) - Bug fixes.
3.0.10.0 - Bug fixes.
3.0.8.0 - Users can now give their suggestions - Bug fixes.
3.0.7.0 - App available in 30+ languages. - Minor bug fixes.

data.name: Publish_Description
data.value:
Introducing our enhanced 'Export Your Calendar' feature! Now, based on user feedback, we've expanded the export capabilities beyond .csv files. In addition to .csv, users can seamlessly export their data into .json, .xml, and .ics formats.
But that's not all – we've also integrated support for both Google and Microsoft online calendars. Say goodbye to platform limitations! Whether you're a Google Calendar aficionado or a die-hard Microsoft Outlook user, you can now effortlessly export your entire schedule with just a few clicks.
You may have legal confidentiality and record-keeping requirements or maybe you want a consistent interface across calendars. Export your calendar without compromising your data privacy or security. A full calendar archive is essential - no incomplete records!
While Export Your Calendar is free to download, we offer a trial period with limited event exports. For a nominal fee, you can unlock unlimited exports and gain access to all features. Please note that this is not free software, and without purchase, downloads are limited to 10 lines.
Download 'Export Your Calendars' now and experience the convenience of seamless data management!
"We understand the importance of user feedback. If you have suggestions for new export formats or features, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via email (team@freytag.us). Your input helps us continuously improve our product to better meet your needs."

data.name: Publish_Feature4
data.value: - App run locally, ensures data privacy.

data.name: tbLine1
data.value: Need help or have a feature request please tell us!

data.name: tbLine2
data.value: -- If you need help, raise a support request. Or We would be glad to hear if you wish to give feedback, suggestions, ask for a feature request, or even if you need to customize the application for your needs.

data.name: tbLine3
data.value: -- Notice a bug? let us know, we will fix it and we might give you a free* copy.

data.name: tbCustomNoticeMessage
data.value:
"Dear User,
This app requires specific permissions from you to operate effectively. The following screen will present options to grant this app basic read permissions to access your calendar data (as shown in this image).
Please make sure to check all the checkboxes provided (if any) and then proceed by clicking the 'Continue' or 'Accept' button."
If you have any concerns then please take a screenshot and email us at support@freytag.us

data.name: tbCustomErrorMessage
data.value:
You did not grant this app the required permission during Google or Microsoft Login consent screen.
Please grant the necessary permission by ticking all the checkboxes(whereever applicable) displayed on the screen saying 'FandCO Export Your Calendar wants access to your Google or Microsoft Account' as seen in screenshot
If your still receive errors like 'Request had insufficient authentication scopes' or 'The caller does not have permission to request' then please take a screenshot and email us at support@freytag.us

data.name: txtErrorMessageTitle
data.value: Error: Take screenshot and email to support@freytag.us

data.value: Please make sure your computer is connected to the Internet. Registeration requires internet connection

data.name: InsufficientAuthenticationScopesError
data.value: Try Again: Sorry to say, Your login was successful, HOWEVER, you didn't grant this app the required permissions during the Google Login consent screen. Kindly provide the necessary permissions by checking all the checkboxes displayed on the screen stating 'F&CO Export Google Calendar requests access to your Google Account'. The application cannot proceed further without your granting the necessary permissions.
